mapper.insert: insert into bdc_biz_type_convert_field (biz_type, field, field_key, field_value) values (#{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

biz_type,
field,
field_key,
field_value,
